## Setup Stuff
```{r}
library(palmerpenguins)
library(tidyverse)
penguins
```

## Question 1
```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = flipper_length_mm)) +
  geom_histogram(colour = "black", fill = "red", bins = 10)
```

## Question 2
```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = body_mass_g)) +
  geom_point(aes(colour = island)) +
  geom_smooth()
```

## Question 3a
```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = flipper_length_mm)) +
  geom_point(aes(colour = species))
```

## Question 3b
```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = flipper_length_mm)) +
  geom_point(aes(colour = species)) +
  facet_wrap(~ species)
```
